HomePage.title-subtitle: Anonymous photo hosting with automatic metadata cleaning

UploadForm.instruction-1: Upload images by simply dragging and dropping them anywhere in the window right now.
UploadForm.instruction-3: Maximum size - 5000x5000 pixels; There should be no more than 16 files at time.
UploadForm.instruction-4: Allowed photo types: png, jpeg, jpg, gif;
UploadForm.dropzone: Drag and drop images here, or click to select files
